meanings.definition: A word or phrase that describes or identifies something
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to write down three descriptors for the animal.
meanings.sent2: She used colorful descriptors to paint a vivid picture of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The descriptors the detective used to solve the case were unexpected but effective.
meanings.sent4: His descriptors of the mysterious house sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The descriptors 'tall, dark, and handsome' perfectly fit the leading man in the movie.

meanings.definition: A characteristic or attribute used to describe something
meanings.sent1: The descriptors of the old house included creaky floors and peeling paint.
meanings.sent2: One of the key descriptors of her personality was her kindness towards others.
meanings.sent3: The descriptors of the magic potion were so bizarre that no one believed it would work.
meanings.sent4: The storm's descriptors of power and fury were evident in the destruction left behind.
meanings.sent5: The unique descriptors of the rare gemstone made it highly sought after by collectors.
